short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SoundCloud Enhancement Suite (SES) is a chrome extension that brings some quality of life improvements when browsing SoundCloud

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Removes reposted content from your stream
* Hides the "discover" page, browsing to it redirects to the stream page.
* Adds a "RELOAD" button for pullups to the audio player
* Adds a direct link to "The Upload" playlist to the header
